title: #69: A Real Tough Guy: An Open Confession From Mafia Insider Vince Ciacci
description:
The RCP team talk to gangster Vince Ciacci about his book "Mobshot", the cycle of violence and what he has learned. 

Mobshot is available on Audible and is narrated by Vince.

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime
